fields.name: age(1st session)
fields.title: Age
fields.description: Participants' age (during 1st session) in months.

fields.name: PPVT_raw
fields.title: PPVT raw scores
fields.description: Peabody Pictured Vocabulary Test raw scores

fields.name: PPVT_z
fields.description: Peabody Pictured Vocabulary Test z- scores
fields.title: PPVT z scores

fields.name: RCPM_raw
fields.title: RCPM raw scores
fields.description: Raven's Colored Progressive Matrices raw scores. RCPM measures non-verbal intelligence.

fields.name: RCPM_z
fields.title: RCPM z scores
fields.description: Raven's Colored Progressive Matrices raw scores. RCPM measures non-verbal intelligence

fields.name: Srep_structure_correct/32
fields.title: Sentence Repetition
fields.description: The Sentence Repetition task, scored according to structure correct, is comprised of 32 sentences of varying syntactic complexity. Hence, the score is out of 32.

fields.name: morph_prod/24
fields.title: Morphosyntax production
fields.description: The morphosyntax production task is a subtest of the Developmental Verbal IQ test (Tsimpli & Stavrakaki 2001). It contains  24 items.

fields.name: morph_comp/31
fields.title: Morphosyntax comprehension
fields.description: The morphosyntax comprehension task is a subtest of the Developmental Verbal IQ test (Tsimpli & Stavrakaki 2001). It contains 31 items.

fields.name: syll_manip/12
fields.title: Syllable manipulation
fields.description: Syllable manipulation is a composite score, taken from the three syllable manipulation subtests of the Metaphon test, measuring phonological awareness. It is scored out of 12.

fields.name: phon_manip/8
fields.description: Phoneme manipulation is a composite score, taken from two phoneme manipulation subtests of the Metaphon test, measuring phonological awareness. It is scored out of 8.
fields.title: Phoneme manipulation

fields.name: pseudoword_rep/48
fields.title: Pseudoword repetition
fields.description:
Repetition of pseudowords: score out of 48
(phonological working memory)

fields.name: fwd_recall/54
fields.title: Forward digit recall
fields.description:
Forward digit recall: score out of 54
(verbal working memory)

fields.name: fwd_recall_range/9
fields.title: Forward digit recall range
fields.description: The range of the recall, out of possible 9

fields.name: bwd_recall/45
fields.title: Backward digit recall
fields.description: Backward digit recall: score out of 45

fields.name: bwd_recall_range/9
fields.description: The range of the recall, out of possible 9
fields.title: Backward digit recall range

fields.name: fwd_corsi/54
fields.title: Corsi task forward
fields.description: Visuospatial WM (Corsi task) forward recall: score out of 54

fields.name: fwd_corsi_range/9
fields.title: Corsi task forward range
fields.description: The range of the recall, out of possible 9

fields.name: bwd_corsi/45
fields.title: Corsi task backward
fields.description: Visuospatial WM (Corsi task) backward recall: score out of 45

fields.name: bwd_corsi_range/9
fields.title: Corsi task backward
fields.description: The range of the recall, out of possible 9

fields.name: melody_score
fields.title: Melody score
fields.description: Score of the melody subtest of the MBEMA (Peretz et al. 2013) - out of 20.

fields.name: rhythm_score
fields.description: Score of the rhythm subtest of the MBEMA (Peretz et al. 2013) - out of 20.
fields.title: Rhythm score

fields.name: cBAT_score
fields.title: cBAT score
fields.description: Overall percentage of the complex Beat Alignment Test (Einarson 2016)

fields.name: complex_cBAT
fields.title: complex cBAT
fields.description: Percentage for the complex rhythm items of the cBAT

fields.name: simple_cBAT
fields.description: Percentage for thesimple rhythm items of the cBAT
fields.title: simple cBAT

name: 16-11-correlational-data
title: correlational datapackage
description: This dataset corresponds to the data gathered for my PhD project. It contains participants' scores in measures of receptive vocabulary, non-verbal IQ, sentence repetition, morphosyntax production and comprehension, phonological awareness, working memory, and music skills. Participants' age is available in months.
